Summary: Bright blue light rotating from a fixed spot, creating a half circle of light. When rotation complete would drop straight down and stop and repeat total of 3 times before I lost sight.
divs: sighting detailsapproximately 8:30 pm on 1\16\2012, i was walking my normal route near a neighborhood mixed with houses and industrial\commercial buildings. as i rounded a corner i saw a bright blue light, i thought it was a helicopter at first, but it proceeded to make a tight circle, as it did the single blue light would make a "half circle" appearance (i assume the light was on the other side). as soon as the blue light completed its circle it made a sudden drop straight down and then stop. it did the rotation and drop two more times before i lost sight of it behind trees. i observed this for about 5-7 minutes. i could not see the outline of the craft or hear any noise, i also couldn't judge how large it was or how far away it could have been. i was looking almost due west from the cypress, ca area towards long beach, ca. i was probably less than a mile from the los alamitos joint forces training center, los alamitos, ca.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Cypress
There were no other sightings in Cypress on or around January 16th 2012
